name: Dogbot
description:
Created in two weeks for the Pigsquad Summer Slow Jams' "Turn-Based Games" jam.

Play as a robotic canine warrior in this turn-based action RPG.

Controls (Keyboard):

  • Arrow keys - Move, Navigate menus
  • Z - Jump, Confirm selection, Dodge, Attack
  • X - Cancel selection, Block

Controls (Xbox Controller):

  • L Stick - Move, Navigate menus
  • A - Jump, Confirm selection, Dodge, Attack
  • B - Cancel, Block

Debug keys:

  • 1-6: Change screen size
  • F1: Restart game
  • F2: Instantly destroy all enemies (Erases score at end)
  • F3: Take screenshot (Saves to C:\Users\<username>\AppData\Local\turn_based_game)
  • F4: Toggle fullscreen
